main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 5 May 1947 in Oakdale, California at 1501 pst. The object was observed for 10-15 seconds, exhibited bobbing and weaving maneuvers, and was silver in color, traveling at a very high speed and an estimated altitude of 2 miles.
interesting points: The sighting involved a group of 12 unidentified objects, moving at a very high speed and exhibiting unusual maneuvers.
The source of the report was a civilian witness, adding credibility to the observation.
The object was observed at a very high estimated altitude of 2 miles, suggesting advanced or unconventional flight capabilities.
The UFO was silver in color, which is not consistent with typical aircraft or natural phenomena.
The sighting occurred at a specific time and location, providing a detailed record of the event.
